name: Infrasonic Relay Upgrade
description: The Infrasonic Relay Upgrade grants Prospectors access toOperationslocked behind encoded signals.Operationsare a variation of traditionalMissionsthat are started inOpen Worlds. Upon completing an Operation, Prospectors will be granted Ren () andExotics/Volatile Exoticsfor their efforts (rewards vary per Operation and is affected by Open World difficulty). To accessEncrypted Signals, Prospectors will need to craft anEncrypted Satellite Upgrade.
